answerText: Victor-Marie Hugo [10] Victor Hugo is pretty well known for this novel, in which Jean Valjean saves the life of Inspector Javert, even though the latter is trying to capture him.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Harvard | 7 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One of his plays, Le roi s'amuse, referred to Francis I, while another, never performed, was entitled Cromwell. For 10 points each:  [10] Identify this author, who created characters like Enjolras, a student leader, and a man who kills himself after hearing a horn blown by Silva, Hernani.
